mode.name: system
mode.query: select id as server_id, name as profile_name, hostname, ( select login from web_contact where rhnserver.creator_id = web_contact.id ) as registered_by, rhnserver.created as registration_time, ( select checkin from rhnserverinfo where rhnserver.id = server_id ) as last_checkin_time, running_kernel as kernel_version, ( select name from web_customer where rhnserver.org_id = web_customer.id ) as organization, machine_id from rhnServer
